CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in this table , when the GPC was measured using polystyrene as the standard , the number - average molecular weights ( M n ) of PQCDTB and PCZDTB were 49.8 and 15.2 kg / mol , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. Polystyrene: This is the material used as the standard for measuring the number-average molecular weights (Mn) of PQCDTB and PCZDTB.
2. PQCDTB: This is the first material whose number-average molecular weight (Mn) is mentioned in the paragraph.
3. PCZDTB: This is the second material whose number-average molecular weight (Mn) is mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PQCDTB
2. PCZDTB
3. Polystyrene (as it is the material used as a standard, but not a material of interest in this context)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PCZDTB |
| Polystyrene (standard) |

However, since the instruction was to remove irrelevant entities, the final table should only include:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PCZDTB |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in this table , when the GPC was measured using polystyrene as the standard , the number - average molecular weights ( M n ) of PQCDTB and PCZDTB were 49.8 and 15.2 kg / mol , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. GPC: Gel Permeation Chromatography
2. Molar masses: number-average molecular weights
3. PQCDTB: a specific type of polymer (name may vary)
4. PCZDTB: another specific type of polymer (name may vary)
5. kg/mol: kilograms per mole

So, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Gel Permeation Chromatography (GPC)
2. Molar masses (specifically number-average molecular weights)
3. PQCDTB
4. PCZDTB
5. kilograms per mole (kg/mol)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Molar masses (specifically number-average molecular weights)
2. PQCDTB
3. PCZDTB

So, the relevant "Material Property" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Number-average molecular weights of PQCDTB and PCZDTB.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Number-average molecular weights of PQCDTB and PCZDTB |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in this table , when the GPC was measured using polystyrene as the standard , the number - average molecular weights ( M n ) of PQCDTB and PCZDTB were 49.8 and 15.2 kg / mol , respectively.

Let's think step by step.
1. "49.8 kg / mol" and "15.2 kg / mol" are the property values for the molecular weights (Mn) of PQCDTB and PCZDTB respectively.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.
1. "49.8 kg / mol" and "15.2 kg / mol" are the property values for molecular weights of PQCDTB and PCZDTB respectively.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 49.8 kg / mol (molecular weight of PQCDTB) |
| 15.2 kg / mol (molecular weight of PCZDTB) |
